duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct interviews with client stakeholders to assess current metadata management and data governance capabilities.
Translate use cases into requirements to communicate to the technical implementation team for implementation into Collibra.
Collaborate closely with business stakeholders to ingest and analyze existing data dictionaries, business glossaries, and taxonomies.
Provide guidance in setting the relevant workflows, roles, views, and audit reports within Collibra to support governance of the data inventory development.
Develop data quality metrics and support lineage creation in Collibra.
Define change management and communications plans to effectively drive change.

education_certification.credential: Data Management Certification (e.g. CDMP or Collibra)
Working knowledge of federal requirements impacting data
